title: Several ListView pen input issues when DragToReorder is enabled
body: We're seeing a range of interaction glitches with the ListView control in UWP, when the "drag to reorder" behavior is enabled. You can see this in the standard UWP demo, DragAndDropSampleNative, in its first section ("drag and drop to reorder"). Compare the behavior between the leftmost list ("All items") which has no drag-to-reorder and the second list ("Selection").

comments.body: Let me just add a little context above: I ran into this running Windows 1803, targetting 17134 SDK. I tried both C# and C++ debug builds, x64 target. It happens both in this demo app and in our real app.
